item.description: Change 'type' or 'strategy' above to try different Component Types, like Sequencer

items.content: Welcome to personal trainer. What workout are you looking for today? You can ask for cardio, yoga, strength training etc.
Welcome to personal trainer for guided workouts. You can ask for 20 minute yoga, strength training for biceps etc. So, what do you want?
Hi there. Just ask for a workout and I will find a video for you. For example, you can say easy cardio workouts for legs.
